page.title: 04Farming 3
page.content: She now keeps 5{donkeys}for interest rather than on a commercial basis. 3 riding ponies are kept and the whole farm has an attractive appearance. Animals are branded with a crown, this is particualary important for their 30{New Forest ponies}scattered around the Forest for the statutary Â£10 a year grazing fee.Cattle are kept from birth to slaughter. Their bull is affectionately known as Robert.Animals are taken to{Salisbury Market},Mondays for selling{beef cattle}and Tuesday for buying.{Ringwood Market}is also attended,but most of the business is conducted outside the ring. The farm owns haymaking equipment and 2 tractors and the animals eat grass in the summer and hay in the winter with the usual supplements. She makes her own butter,cheese and yoghurt and grows all their vegetables.
